title: LP bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: I had 2 LP`s. After the a win i still had 2 LP`s. The game didnt gave the proper LP`s for winning that match. Can pls some1 help me?

replies.body: EUNE is currently having this issue where LP gains/losses aren't being displayed properly. Be sure to [**check the status page for updates**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune).
I didnt get LP for win also, but next two loses of course i lost LP :)
